name: A2B2 Presents: DINONETIX
description:
You've heard the album, now play the game! Commemorating death insurance's "i'm in your walls" album release, A2B2 brings you a challenge of epic proportions. Take on the role of Chicken as you collect mushrooms in the enchanted forest. But beware the dreaded T-Rex, who hides around every corner...Who can collect all 100 mushrooms and gain the highest score?! DINONETIX is available for both Mac and Windows. Gaming computer recommended for best quality.

A2B2.org, brainchild of Death Grips’ Andy Morin, started out as a creative outlet for Morin himself. It has now grown into an online creative community boasting a record label, live event series, radio show, magazine, and more.

WASD - Move

Space - Jump

Esc - Pause

F10 - Toggle FPS

F11 - Console
